nodes.text: Leia Organa - A Princess, A General, A Mentor
"Leia Organa - A Princess, A General, A Mentor" is the fortieth episode of Star Wars Galaxy of Adventures. It premiered on the Star Wars Kids YouTube channel on March 13, 2020.

The video opens with images of Leia Organa's face. A voiceover says that the General is royalty to him. General Organa speaks to Rey before she departs on the Millennium Falcon to find Luke Skywalker on Ahch-To. She tells Rey that the Force will be with her.

The narrator explains that General Organa guides heroes to "greatness" in a "galaxy of adventures". Later, General Organa speaks with Poe Dameron as he climbs aboard his T-70 X-wing starfighter Black One. Poe asks the General for permission to blow something up. There is a shot of the Mandator IV-class Siege Dreadnought Fulminatrix exploding.

Later, Rey shows Leia the broken Skywalker lightsaber and asks how they will rebuild the Rebellion following the Battle of Crait. Leia reassures her that they have everything they need. Rey later trains with remotes on Ajan Kloss while General Organa watches.
This is followed by several images of Leia standing with Luke Skywalker, Han Solo, Chewbacca, R2-D2, C-3PO and Lando Calrissian aboard the Millennium Falcon and on Endor.

In the present, we see Leia standing with Rose Tico, Finn, Rey, BB-8, and D-O.
The video ends with Poe telling the others to follow him. Leia encourages the other Resistance fighters to following Poe, passing on the baton of leadership. The video ends with a close-up of Leia's face.
